title: RBI Office Assistant Recruitment 2026
overview: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released a notification for Office Assistant recruitment. Candidates who have passed 10th class are eligible to apply online for this post.
age: 18 to 30 Years (Age relaxation as per RBI recruitment rules)
fees:
General / OBC: ₹450
SC / ST / PWD / Female: ₹50
selection:
Written Examination
Skill Test
Document Verification
importantDates:
Application Start: March 2026
Last Date to Apply: 25 April 2026
Exam Date: Notified Soon
applyProcess: Candidates need to visit the official RBI website, complete registration, fill the application form, upload required documents and pay the application fee.
